TEXT.TITLE: AMERICUS TRUST <ATU> AND <ATP> INITIAL DIVIDEND
TEXT.BODY: Americus Trust for American Telephone and Telegraph Shares Series Two said it will distribute an initial dividend of 28.75 cts on May 12 to shareholders of record March 31. Reuter
